code: @Manual{,   title = {when: Definition of Date and Time Dimension Tables},   author = {Jose Samos},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/josesamos/when},   url = {https://josesamos.github.io/when/}, }

what: Definition of Date and Time Dimension Tables
title: Definition of Date and Time Dimension Tables
text: dimension plays fundamental role Multidimensional Systems, allows us express analysed focus attention occurred. purpose package assist implementation dimension multidimensional systems. particular, supports generation tables implementation date time ROLAP (Relational -Line Analytical Processing) systems.

title: Definition of Date and Time Dimension Tables
Definition of Date and Time Dimension Tables
text: obtain table dates indicate start date end date. can select level detail, attributes include language literals day month names. following example indicate language different one computer’s operating system. result obtained shown . want table time, indicate type using parameter. default get seconds day can also configure different period level detail. start end result table shown . day_part predefined English. Literals hours can changed using configuration function. addition obtaining tibble, can export tables files csv xlsx format. can also exported directly Relational DBMS.
code: library(when)  date <-   when(     locale = Sys.setlocale("LC_TIME", "English"),     start = lubridate::today(),     end = lubridate::today() + 9   ) |>   generate_table() |>   get_table() pander::pandoc.table(date, split.table = Inf) time <-   when(type = 'time') |>   generate_table() |>   get_table() pander::pandoc.table(rbind(head(time, 5), tail(time, 5)),                      split.table = Inf)

text: td object. name string, table name. type string, type calendar (NULL, 'iso', 'epi' 'time'). locale locale, use day month names. week_starts_monday boolean.

code: my_db <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite())  when() |>   generate_table() |>   get_table_rdb(my_db) #> Error: .onLoad failed in loadNamespace() for 'dm', details: #>   call: (function (packages, top_level_fun, use = TRUE)  #>   error: The packages "DiagrammeR" and "DiagrammeRsvg" are required to use #> `register_pkgdown_methods()`. title: Include day level — include_day_level
text: td object. day_level boolean, include day level. include_date boolean, include date. include_month_day boolean, include day number month. include_week_day boolean, day number week. include_day_name boolean, include name day week. include_day_abbr boolean, include name day week abbreviated version. include_day_num_name boolean, include number name day week. include_day_num_abbr boolean, include number name day week abbreviated version. include_quarter_day boolean, include number day quarter. include_year_day boolean, include number day year.
